properties.entry: update sc_purchase_supplier_inquiry set IS_USED = '1' WHERE SUPPLIER_ID = '{@#supplierId#}' and SKU = '{@#sku#}' and plan_id = '{@#planId#}'

SELECT spsi.* , ss.NAME, ss.ID AS SUP_ID FROM sc_supplier ss, sc_real_product_supplier srps LEFT JOIN sc_purchase_supplier_inquiry spsi ON srps.REAL_SKU = spsi.SKU AND srps.SUPPLIER_ID = spsi.SUPPLIER_ID AND spsi.PLAN_ID = '{@#planId#}' WHERE srps.REAL_SKU = '{@#sku#}' AND ss.ID = srps.SUPPLIER_ID {@ and srps.supplier_id = '#supplierId#'}

INSERT INTO sc_purchase_supplier_inquiry ( SUPPLIER_ID, SKU, PLAN_ID, WEIGHT, CYCLE, PACKAGE, PAYMENT, NUMBER_OFFER, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, NUM1, OFFER1, NUM2, OFFER2, NUM3, OFFER3, NUM4, OFFER4, NUM5, OFFER5, STATUS, MEMO, URL, IMAGE, PRODUCT_SIZE, PACKAGE_SIZE ) VALUES ( '{@#supplierId#}', '{@#sku#}', '{@#planId#}', '{@#weight#}', '{@#cycle#}', '{@#package#}', '{@#payment#}', '{@#numberOffer#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW(), '{@#num1#}', '{@#offer1#}', '{@#num2#}', '{@#offer2#}', '{@#num3#}', '{@#offer3#}', '{@#num4#}', '{@#offer4#}', '{@#num5#}', '{@#offer5#}', '{@#status#}', '{@#memo#}', '{@#url#}', '{@#image#}', '{@#productSize#}', '{@#packageSize#}' )

UPDATE sc_purchase_supplier_inquiry SET weight = '{@#weight#}' , cycle = '{@#cycle#}' , package = '{@#package#}' , payment = '{@#payment#}' , number_offer = '{@#numberOffer#}' , num1 = '{@#num1#}' , offer1 = '{@#offer1#}' , num2 = '{@#num2#}' , offer2 = '{@#offer2#}' , num3 = '{@#num3#}' , offer3 = '{@#offer3#}' , num4 = '{@#num4#}' , offer4 = '{@#offer4#}' , num5 = '{@#num5#}' , offer5 = '{@#offer5#}' , status = '{@#status#}' , memo = '{@#memo#}' , url = '{@#url#}' , {@image = '#image#' , } product_size = '{@#productSize#}' , package_size = '{@#packageSize#}' WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'
